        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileNames​(java.lang.String[] names)
        Given a list of names that may include files or directories, return a list of files that contains (1) all of the files in the original list and (2) all files ending with ".txt" in directories from the original list.
        Parameters:
        names - list of names (files or directories)
        Returns:
        list of filenames

      • redirect_print

        public static void redirect_print​(java.lang.StringBuffer buffer)
        Redirect "f.pln" and "f.p" methods to the given StringBuffer. To restore these methods to use standard output, call this method with a null;
        Parameters:
        buffer - the output sent by f.pln and f.p calls NOT THREAD SAFE

      • FmLead

        public static java.lang.String FmLead​(int v,
                                      int minLength)
        Add leading zeros to a string representation of an integer. If the integer is greater than the number of lead length, then just return the integer as a string.
        • FmLead(3,2) == 03
        • FmLead(100,2) == 100
        Parameters:
        v - the integer
        minLength - the minimum length.
        Returns:
        a string representation of this integer

        String form of numeric value to the indicated precision (overrides Constants.get_output_precision())
        Parameters:
        v - value to print
        precision - number of fractional digits to include
        Returns:

      • FmPrecision

        public static java.lang.String FmPrecision​(double v,
                                           int precision,
                                           boolean includeTrailingZeros)
        String form of numeric value to the indicated precision (overrides Constants.get_output_precision() and Constants.get_trailing_zeros())
        Parameters:
        v - value to print
        precision - number of fractional digits to include
        includeTrailingZeros - if true, include fractional trailing zeros, if false, truncate fractional trailing zeros
        Returns:

        public static java.lang.String fmt​(double v,
                                   java.lang.String units,
                                   int width,
                                   int precision)
        Format the double value after converting into the given units. The returned string has a given width and the value has the given number of digits of precision.
        Parameters:
        v - value
        units - units
        width - width
        precision - digits of precision
        Returns:
        a string represents the value

      • array2str

        public static java.lang.String array2str​(double[] data,
                                         java.lang.String unit,
                                         int width,
                                         int precision)
        Return a string representation of the data in this 1-dimensional array. A newline is NOT added to the end.
        Parameters:
        data - data to make a string
        unit - the unit to convert the values to
        width - width
        precision - number of digits of precision
        Returns:
        the resulting string

        Parameters:

        the resulting string

      • toPlatform

        public static java.lang.String toPlatform​(java.lang.String str)
        Converts Unix line separators to platform line separator. Most of the time, Java handles this seamlessly, but there are some places where this is needed.
        Parameters:
        str - the string with Unix separators (\n)
        Returns:
        a string with Unix separators replaced with the platform-specific separators
